Title: Full SNAP benefits start to go out even as the Trump administration appeals
Description:
A federal judge ordered the government to fully fund food aid by Friday.
The Trump administration's appeal was denied, so it's asking appealed, saying it's up to Congress to fund SNAP.

Title: Older Adults Outnumber Children in 11 States
Description:
The U.S.
population age 65 and older rose by 3.1% (to 61.2 million) while the population under age 18 decreased by 0.2% (to 73.1 million) from 2023 to 2024.

Title: Hay restaurantes en Nueva York con trabajadores que atienden a la clientela desde Filipinas y por Zoom. Cobran 3 dólares la hora

Title: Stanford makes stem cell transplants safer without chemo
Description:
A Stanford-led team has replaced toxic pre-transplant chemotherapy with a targeted antibody, allowing children with Fanconi anemia to receive stem cell transplants safely.
The antibody, briquilimab, removes diseased stem cells without radiation, enabling near…

Title: „Woke is broke“ bei LLMs: Wie Tech-Konzerne den Wertekompass der KI verschieben
Description:
KI-Modelle in der Schraubzwinge des Kulturkampfes: Sprachmodelle wie ChatGPT oder Gemini werden auf „wokeness“ getrimmt, so der Vorwurf von rechts.
Dort hofft man, dass Trumps „revolution of common sense“ auch die neuen Denkwerkzeuge erfasst.
